title: Fail smoketester if there is LUCENE_XXXX or SOLR_XXXX in Changes.txt
description:
One of these slipped into the 4.8.1 release in the solr changes.

Looking at trunk/4.9 in solr/CHANGES.txt, there are quite a few SOLR_XXXX issues. When the underscore is used, no link to the issue is generated.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1596036 from Michael McCandless in branch 'dev/branches/lucene_solr_4_8'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1596036 ]

LUCENE-5686: fail if LUCENE/SOLR_NNNN (_ instead of -) appears in changes
